org.gbif.registry.metadata.parse.converter

Class GreedyUriConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.beanutils.converters.AbstractConverter
      • org.gbif.registry.metadata.parse.converter.GreedyUriConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.commons.beanutils.Converter

    public final class GreedyUriConverter
extends org.apache.commons.beanutils.converters.AbstractConverter
    Greedy String to URI converter. Greedy in the sense that it will try to add a default protocol (http://) in cases where none exists. For example, this captures URLs such as www.gbif.org that otherwise would get converted into a wrong URI.

      • GreedyUriConverter

        public GreedyUriConverter(Object defaultValue)
        Construct a URI Converter that returns a default value if an error occurs.
        Parameters:
        defaultValue - The default value to be returned if the value to be converted is missing or an error occurs converting the value.

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public URI convert(String value)
        Convert a String into a java.net.URI. In case its missing the protocol prefix, it is prefixed with the default protocol.
        Parameters:
        value - The input value to be converted.
        Returns:
        The converted value, or null if an exception occurred
